title: WATCH: DT Tim Smith highlights and what he brings to Indianapolis Colts
description: Take a look at new Indianapolis Colts' defensive tackle Tim Smith, who the team drafted in the sixth round out of Alabama.

html:
Take a look at new Indianapolis Colts' defensive tackle Tim Smith, who the team drafted in the sixth round out of Alabama.

Smith filled a rotational role along the Alabama defensive front and was at his best as a run-stuffer in the middle of the front. By¬†PFF's metrics, he was one of the top interior run defenders last season. Smith can hopefully provide improved depth behind DeForest Buckner and Grover Stewart.

‚ÄúI think what‚Äôs unique about him is his ability to play blocks," said assistant director of college scouting Jamie Moore via the Indy Star. It‚Äôs something that (defensive coordinator) Lou (Anarumo) talked about when he got here, explaining how this defense is going to operate up front. Lou likes versatility. ‚Ä¶ Tim has very heavy hands. He‚Äôs got knockback. If anybody has ever studied a Nick Saban defense, you understand that you better know how to play with your hands. He can play square to the line of scrimmage, he‚Äôs a really good run defender.‚Äù
